thread.title: Laura from Blushpic Portrait Studio
thread.title_full: Newprint.ca reviewed by Laura from Blushpic Portrait Studio

author: Laura from Blushpic Portrait Studio
title: Laura from Blushpic Portrait Studio
text:
As I approach an upcoming trade show I ordered Tear Cards (to use as flyers/contest draw), business cards and postcards (intentes for gift certificates).
Using this service for the first time I asked for an estimate because the sizes I was looking for where not available in the automated calculator. I was a little disappointed to get an email asking me to send my design before giving me an estimate since the point of an estimate is to know how much you will be paying before you go ahead and design or purchase your items.
Nonetheless I went ahead and settled for the sizes available in the automated calculator and received my order very fast.
The quality is pretty good, being a photographer I'm quite picky about that because my flyers display some of my photos and I was pleasantly surprised with the quality.
Some of my business cards where not cut even but I've notice this is pretty standard when bulk buying with most companies.
Their customer service is amazing, they answered all my questions and where very helpful.
Overall I'm very happy with the results and looking forward to use all these goodies at my trade show and will definitely reorder from them in the future.
